item.description:
Saturday Track Workouts allow you to mix distance and speed workouts with fun and varied drills and work stations in a designed fitness course.

Track workouts will include station work (stretches, situps and core, jumprope and squats/lower-body, and sprint and distance running). You'll find that you are stronger, have better endurance, and are less sore (with increased recovery time) after attending a few of these.

Time: 9 AM

Place: Brookline Reservoir (plenty of free parking spaces on Dudley Street)

Duration: 45 mins to 1 hour 15 mins

What to Bring: Weather appropriate clothing, running shoes, water, jumprope. (optional: small hand weights)

Things to know: There are no bathrooms on location, nor a changing area. The reservoir can also be reached by bike and foot (Google it). The Green D-Line will drop you off at the closest station (check an MBTA map for details and distance - but it is walkable/jog-able from the T)
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the only person standing around
item.name: Triathanewbie Series - Saturday Track Workout
